verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:28
verses.text: So the king of Israel and Jehoshaphat the king of Judah went up to Ramoth–gilead.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:29
verses.text: And the king of Israel said unto Jehoshaphat, I will disguise myself, and will go to the battle; but put thou on thy robes. So the king of Israel disguised himself; and they went to the battle.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:30
verses.text: Now the king of Syria had commanded the captains of the chariots that were with him, saying, Fight ye not with small or great, save only with the king of Israel.
